name: Spaceship Defender
description:
Spaceship Defender is a 2D arcade style shooter game for the web and Android devices.

In the future, Earth met an alien race called the Dizmoffs, who wanted to enslave the planet.  To combat this, NASA created a prototype spaceship defender to protect the planet, and it’s up to you, Captain Gina-Wendy Loqutous, to command the vessel and defeat the Dizmoffs.  Be cautious however, as the more attacking vessels you destroy, the more will try to stop you, and the more difficult is will be to stop them.

The game will be available for internet browsers and Android devices.
